meanings.definition: A large carnivorous dinosaur of the late Jurassic period.
meanings.sent1: The allosaurus roamed the land searching for food.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the bones of the allosaurus to learn more about dinosaurs.
meanings.sent3: The allosaurus tried to hide behind a tree, but its size gave it away.
meanings.sent4: In the children's book, the allosaurus symbolized strength and bravery.
meanings.sent5: The museum exhibit featured a life-sized allosaurus skeleton.

meanings.sent1: The allosaurus is known for its sharp teeth and claws.
meanings.sent2: Many fossils of the allosaurus have been discovered in different parts of the world.
meanings.sent3: During the dinosaur party, the allosaurus danced with a T-rex.
meanings.sent4: The allosaurus in the movie represented the ancient rulers of the land.
meanings.sent5: Children love to imagine themselves riding on the back of an allosaurus.
